title: THE FIORA REWORK RUINED THIS GAME FOR ME...       I WAS A BIG FAN BUT NOT ANYMORE. IT BURNED ME OUT
body:
THE FIORA REWORK ABSOLUTELY RUINED THIS GAME FOR ME.

NO BLADE WALTZ... 

I AM JUST GONNA AFK RIGHT NOW I'M TIRED OF FEEDING BECAUSE RIOT RUINED MY FIORA.

I'M NO GOOD FOR ANYBODY.

WITHOUT THE OLD FIORA I JUST FEED.

NONE OF YOUR TIPS ARE GOING TO HELP. 

I JUST HATE THIS REWORK SO MUCH.

replies.body: A few years late to the party but aight.

ay lmao there we go
god i love you name.. shame you dont have the icon.
you new? dudes been at this for as long as I can remember
Im sorry you became dependent on low counter play stat check  champions to find enjoyment.
Alright, is it 2015 again!? Im hyped!
You should give up on spamming the boards. You are not getting old Fiora back, no matter how much you wine and complain.
Just play Master Yi. Blade Waltz was pretty much Alpha Strike, except more broken.
